It was flooded in 1985, and was abandoned. Its ruins are on the eastern shore of the Laguna Epecuén, about north of Carhué. == Images == Image:Epecuen3.JPG|Epecuén Ruins Image:Epecuen2.JPG|Ruins of the Old Slaughterhouse ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Villages Category:Settlements in Argentina Category:1985 disestablishments Category:Disestablishments in South America
